paper_abstract: A graph G is an efficient open domination graph if there exists a subset D of V (G) for which the open neighborhoods centered in vertices of D form a partition of V (G). We completely describe efficient open domination graphs among lexicographic, strong, and disjunctive products of graphs. For the Cartesian product we give a characterization when one factor is K-2.
paper_title: Efficient open domination in graph products
